title: EvidenceReport data model based on HL7 equivalent resource

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/' This is a EvidenceReport resource

id.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/string' A sequence of Unicode characters

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Meta' The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Narrative' A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/ResourceList' These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Extension' Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

modifierExtension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Extension' Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

url.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_url.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

status.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_status.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

useContext.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/UsageContext' Specifies clinical/business/etc. metadata that can be used to retrieve, index and/or categorize an artifact. This metadata can either be specific to the applicable population (e.g., age category, DRG) or the specific context of care (e.g., venue, care setting, provider of care).

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Identifier' An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

relatedIdentifier.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Identifier' An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

citeAsReference.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

citeAsMarkdown.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/' Citation Resource or display of suggested citation for this report.

_citeAsMarkdown.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be EvidenceReport

note.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Annotation' A  text note which also  contains information about who made the statement and when.

relatedArtifact.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/RelatedArtifact' Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

subject.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/EvidenceReport_Subject' The EvidenceReport Resource is a specialized container for a collection of resources and codable concepts, adapted to support compositions of Evidence, EvidenceVariable, and Citation resources and related concepts.

publisher.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/string' A sequence of Unicode characters

_publisher.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

contact.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/ContactDetail' Specifies contact information for a person or organization.

author.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/ContactDetail' Specifies contact information for a person or organization.

reviewer.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/ContactDetail' Specifies contact information for a person or organization.

endorser.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/ContactDetail' Specifies contact information for a person or organization.

relatesTo.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/EvidenceReport_RelatesTo' The EvidenceReport Resource is a specialized container for a collection of resources and codable concepts, adapted to support compositions of Evidence, EvidenceVariable, and Citation resources and related concepts.

section.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/EvidenceReport_Section' The EvidenceReport Resource is a specialized container for a collection of resources and codable concepts, adapted to support compositions of Evidence, EvidenceVariable, and Citation resources and related concepts.
